column2: Each line in MixedInfection.csv represents one individual Drosophila egg
Code for Drosophila host species (BIR: birchii, BIP: bipectinata, PSA: pseudoananassae, PST: pseudotakahashii, PAL: pallidifrons, RUB: rubida, SUL: sulfurigaster)
Code for parasitoid treatment (M: mixed treatment of Asobara, Ganaspis and Leptopilina)
Individual identifier within a given vial
Individual indentity (H: host, P: parasitoid, D: dead)
Code of parasitoid that hatched (MA: Asobara sp., MG: Ganaspis sp., ML: Leptopilina sp.)
